EmailTemplate.name: LE-05-01-202205-HHS-ENT-SEVT-ATA-2022.post-event-missed
EmailTemplate.subject: Key takeaways from the ATA Conference
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Sorry we missed you We’re sorry we weren’t able to connect at the recent ATA Annual Conference in Boston. We hope that you, like us, found insight and inspiration there. Our enterprise virtual care solutions are creating new opportunities for hospital and health systems and helping improve the care experience for clinicians and the people they serve. That includes: - High-acuity care like stroke and emergent solutions - Virtual, on-demand or scheduled access to clinicians—including primary care, urgent care, specialty care, mental health and more - Inpatient solutions that create patient care efficiencies - A unified, integrated virtual care platform powered by Solo with Microsoft Teams Learn more about the Teladoc Health vision <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/resources/video/vision/]]> Let’s find some time to keep the conversation going—just contact us here <[[https://teladochealth.com/#contact-us]]> to connect. About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. All rights reserved. 2 Manhattanville Rd., Purchase, NY 10577
